name: Gear Link 3
description:
Welcome to Gear Link 3 C.A.R.D. Evolution! A procedural deck-building game where you fight on a big old procedural world map and evolve your deck in unexpected directions while defeating enemy after enemy in your search for the DemonLord!

Gain experience on your 20 cards, give them new abilities, watch their names and sprites change, try to figure out how to use these new cards to improve your deck further and then fight some more! A bunch of abilities to mix and match and some dangerous foes! Can you save the realm of Ager Klin?

With music from Flower, Sun and Rain (DS)
